resident_text: Hello?

operator_text: OK. Are you aware that there is a fire approaching and both of you need to evacuate?

operator_text: Well, it's very serious. That's why I'm on here talking to you. So I need for you to get out of the house right now and follow the drone so he can direct you to the emergency vehicle.

operator_text: Yeah, there's a fire approaching north to your house. You need to grab your belongings and head north and get out of there.

resident_text: do you know anywhere in particular we should go?
operator_text: You're going to head north down on the street. So that's the only escape route as of right now. You can follow the drone north if you need to.

operator_text: . Hi, you have fire in your area to the south. You need to evacuate right away, please.
